snippet.title: Dungeon Crawler - Official Developer Video | Black Voices in Gaming 2024
snippet.description: Estelle Makhoba, Gameplay Engineer and Founder at developer Tiny Baby Crown, introduces us to Dungeon Crawler. Dungeon Crawler is an upcoming roguelite, hack n' slash, platformer puzzle game. Makhoba discusses how Dungeon Crawler's imagination mechanic works, the inspiration behind the game's creation, and more. Dungeon Crawler will be available in Q3 2025.
